movie.title: Candyman: Day of the Dead
movie.description_intro: The Candyman returns to try to convince his female descendent, an artist, to join him as a legendary figure. To this end, he frames her for a series of hideous murders of her friends and associates so that she has nowhere else to turn to.
movie.description_full: The Candyman returns to try to convince his female descendent, an artist, to join him as a legendary figure. To this end, he frames her for a series of hideous murders of her friends and associates so that she has nowhere else to turn to.

movies.title: Mermaid: The Lake of the Dead
movies.title_english: Mermaid: The Lake of the Dead
movies.title_long: Mermaid: The Lake of the Dead (2018)
movies.summary: Deep in the forest, on a nameless lake, Roma meets a girl. Her kiss changes his life forever. Very soon, Roma will come to regret the encounter. He's been stricken by an unknown affliction that deprives him of his life force. His girlfriend Marina will stop at nothing to save him from the mysterious evil. But which will prevail: the curse or their love?
movies.description_full: Deep in the forest, on a nameless lake, Roma meets a girl. Her kiss changes his life forever. Very soon, Roma will come to regret the encounter. But which will prevail: the curse or their love?

movies.title: What Lies Below
movies.summary: A 16 year-old girl returns home from camp and learns that her mother has a new boyfriend, one she intends to marry; a man whose charm, intelligence and beauty make him look like he's not human at all.
movies.description_full: A 16 year-old girl returns home from camp and learns that her mother has a new boyfriend, one she intends to marry; a man whose charm, intelligence and beauty make him look like he's not human at all.
movies.synopsis: A 16 year-old girl returns home from camp and learns that her mother has a new boyfriend, one she intends to marry; a man whose charm, intelligence and beauty make him look like he's not human at all.

movies.title: Safrom
movies.summary: A girl involved in an accident is rescued by a motorist who is a former private detective. The two will journey past a horrifying incident unleashed at a nearby pharmaceutical factory. An epidemic is invading the area, between attempts to escape and shelter from the impending threat at some point, the former private detective will come to realize that the cause of the epidemic is not far from him.

movies.title: Shadow in the Cloud
movies.summary: On a stormy night during World War II, a female pilot with top secret cargo talks her way on board a bomber plane about to take-off. The crass all-male crew reluctantly agrees, but their suspicions about her identity and the mysterious cargo quickly grow. Just then a shadow appears in the clouds - was it the incoming Japanese fleet? Or caused by some other sinister stowaway?
